title: E-Commerce Platform
desc: Fullstack e-commerce dengan fitur lengkap: cart, payment gateway, multi-vendor, inventory management, dan order tracking real-time.
text: Baru selesai develop E-Commerce Platform — Fullstack app dengan keranjang belanja, payment system, dan admin dashboard. Support multi-vendor + real-time order tracking.

title: Realtime Chat App
desc: Aplikasi chat real-time: private messaging, group rooms, image sharing, file attachments, dan push notifications.
text: Building real-time chat app — Socket.io memang powerful banget buat handle WebSocket connections. #WebDev #React

title: Analytics Dashboard
desc: Dashboard interaktif untuk visualisasi data penjualan. Chart dinamis, advanced filtering, dan export laporan multi-format.
text: Data visualization — baru deploy analytics dashboard pake D3.js + Vue. Chart dinamis, filter interaktif, dan export ke PDF/Excel. #DataViz

title: Blog & CMS
desc: Content Management System: rich text editor, SEO optimization, multi-language support, media library, dan scheduled publishing.
text: Launching my custom CMS — Rich text editor, SEO tools, multi-language, dan scheduled publishing. Built with Next.js + Prisma. #NextJS
